m_szDocTitle: The World’s 10 Most Energy-Efficient Cities - SFGate
m_szDocSumamry: The World’s 10 Most Energy-Efficient Cities Oilprice.com, The Motley Fool Published 7:02 am, Wednesday, July 9, 2014 This article was written by  Oilprice.com  -- the leading provider of energy news in the world. Also c heck out this recent article:   The Green Energy World Cup Reykjavik, Iceland By most measures, Reykjavik tops the list of energy efficient cities worldwide. Along with the rest of Iceland, Reykjavik relies on renewable hydropower and geothermal plants to provide all of the heat, electricity and hot water for its more than 120,000 citizens.
